data.why:
1. Games::Quizzical , it is quiz-taking program with text, curses,
    cgi, and (possibly) a Gtk+ interface. It comes equipt with hard
    questions on various topis of Perl.

    2. A Netscanner. Just another program that scans for ips, but this
    one checks through arbitrary (unknown) network interfaces.

    3. (Maybe) a whereami program.
